pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels Cool Grey
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights Cool Grey creates stunning pastel colours with a glossy, vivid shine, is semi-permanent, good for 8 washes, and contains no ammonia.

Re-create the latest trend and achieve stunning pastel tones with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights. Get the perfect pastel dip-dye, highlights or all over colour. 

The ready to use formula requires no pre-mixing and works in just 2 minutes!

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights! 

Gentle Conditioning Colour:

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia

- Will not lighten hair

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes

Cool Grey Pastels by Ultra Brights semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine for beautiful, soft pastel grey colour results! 

Boxed Contents: 30mL Sachet of colour, Instruction leaflet, Gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Hair Colour: Cool Grey

Warnings

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua(Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, PEG-8, Ceteareth-12, Ceteareth-20, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Methylparaben, Panthenol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylparaben, HC Blue No. 12, HC Blue No. 16, HC Yellow No. 2, N,N-Bis (2-Hydroxyethyl)-2-Nitro-p-Phenylenediamine, Basic Brown 17, Acid Violet 43, Basic Red 76, Basic Yellow 57, CI 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Citric Acid.

Directions

A skin sensitivity test and a strand test should be undertaken before each application. Read instructions carefully.

USAGE ADVICE

Quick & Easy to Apply:
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour and leave on for 2 to 15 minutes.
- Rinse thoroughly and style as usual .
- We recommend using two packs or more if your hair is longer than chin length.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
